com.cubeia.firebase.api.lobby
Interface LobbyAccessor

All Known Subinterfaces:
LobbyTableAccessor
public interface LobbyAccessor

This interface is a simplified accessor for games to manipulate the lobby data. Unlike the system state service contract this accessor mandates a root path for all object data, for example: "/table/<gameId>/", which enforces separation between games. It also enforces data type control.

Author:
lars.j.nilsson
